name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Ilir SULCAJ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Ilir SULCAJ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of July, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File a Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 15 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
47 A.3d 1179
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Ilir SULCAJ, Petitioner.
No. 31 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 9, 2012.
